name: Rosen Resonance
description: I can not say I am supper please with my third game jam. I feel like I had an interesting idea, but the execution proved to be very unsuccessful. My goal with this game jam was to try making something visually appealing. Not sure if I succeeded at that. The choice also cost me a lot of time to make the game itself. On the upside, I learned A LOT about setting up something visual in unity. Still a lot I wish I did.
